amendment.description: Amendment makes available Foods for Peace commodities valued at $25 million to developing nations to assist in mitigating the effects of HIV and AIDS in communities and households, particularly those caring for orphaned children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $25,000,000 in funding to assist in mitigating the effects of the HIV virus and AIDS syndrome on communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pelosi amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
